item.title: Fire Risk from unsafe disposal of waste material, 27th July
item.description:
Firefighters attend Colthurst Crescent and attention was drawn to a large amount of domestic waste that was primarily comprised of mattress, furniture and wooden flooring. Posed fire risk from deliberate or accidental fire setting.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Colthurst Crescent, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain has been blocked for years, 27th July
item.description:
This drain along with another on the same side of the road has been blocked for years. This causes localised flooding on Hayes lane when the only working drain (of three) is blocked. This has been blocked for years. There was a burst water main today that has caused flooding and I have spent the morning keeping the only working drain open

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayes Lane, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on bus shelter by Crossway/Petts Wood Road, 27th July
item.description:
The graffiti remains weeks after reporting the matter. Someone should remove it. The panels have now been smashed and it looks really bad-no care. Rubbish is left there constantly as no bins are provided. Remove the shelter if you are not looking after it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Petts Wood Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Graffiti / Flyposting on stop or shelter (non-offensive)

item.title: Broken glass re bus shelter, 27th July
item.description:
The bus shelter has broken glass panels and the pavement in front is full of glass. This is very dangerous for little children walking by or dogs on walks. The shelter by Crossway/Petts Wood Road was damaged recently with graffiti and this was reported. I also said if it was left, further damage would occur and this is exactly what has happened.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Petts Wood Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Damage - smashed glass or panels / jagged metal edges on shelter

item.title: Faulty Streetlight, 27th July
